title: 15 Pairs of Burgundy Tights to Liven Up Your Fall and Winter Looks
description: All it takes is one good pair.
excerpt: Among the fall/winter fashion trends and accessories, I can’t escape the pull of burgundy tights. Here are all the pairs I’m shopping right now.

html:
Celebrity Favorite

Calzedonia 50 Denier Total Comfort Soft Touch Tights

Calzedonia is my most trusted go-to for affordable yet high-quality pantyhose—and I’m not the only one; celebrity stylists often rely on the brand. Gigi Hadid even wore a pair to the 2023 Met Gala.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: 13 options

Material: Polyamide, elastane, cotton

Perfectly Sheer

Commando Premier Sheer Tights

Here’s another shapewear brand that I deeply trust: Commando. This semi-sheer version lets just the right amount of skin show through.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: Navy, Raspberry

Material: Nylon, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Shaping Support

J.Crew Control Top Opaque Tights

One of the best parts about tights is that you can skip shaving. To really make the most of that advantage, you’ll want to go with a completely opaque pair.

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Black, White, Midnight Burgundy

Material: Nylon, spandex

Customer review: “I had not tried J.Crew tights before, but these are great! The color is beautiful and looks good with black, brown, and red shoes. The waistband is comfortable.”

Ultra Thin

Mango Thin Veiled Tights

When I hear “thinly veiled,” I think of excuses or motives, not a precious pair of sheer tights. Bonus points to Mango for the creative name.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Black, Red, Green, Burgundy

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Brown Tones

Aritzia Everyday Opaque Tights

Aritzia is known for solid basics at reasonable prices, from blazers and work dresses to puffer coats and hosiery.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Deep Burgundy, Black, Scarab, Flashing Red, Sugarplum Lilac

Material: Nylon, elastane

Slight Sheen

Wolford Neon 40 Tights

A little shine goes a long way, particularly with It girl-approved brand Wolford.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Deep Green, Nearly Black, Port Royale

Material: Nylon, elastane

Customer review: “Luxury pantyhose with shimmer and so COMFY.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Amazon Bestseller

Hue Super Opaque Tights with Control Top

Thank you, Amazon, for offering anything and everything with just the click of a button.

Sizes: 1-5

Colors: 8 options

Material: Nylon, spandex

Customer review: “Perfect fit and sized just right. These are comfortable and make my legs look great. Highly recommend.”

Delicate Print

Hansel From Basel Ribbon Chain Tights

Dare I admit these are my favorite? The pattern and contrast are so darling, plus it’s a subdued nod to the bow trend.

Sizes: One Size

Colors: Cabernet, Black, Sky Blue, Cream

Material: Elastane, nylon

Customer review: “So beautiful! A subtle design to an otherwise simple tight.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Designer Find

Marine Serre Moonogram Mesh Flock Tights

Much to my surprise, Marine Serre is the only designer that I could find a pair of burgundy tights from. Seems like a missed opportunity if you ask me!

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Cherry

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Totally Matte

FALKE Pure Matte 100 Opaque Tights

If you prefer pantyhose that don’t have any sheen, opt for this pair from Falke.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: Barolo Wine, Black, Marine

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Customer review: “These tights are fabulous; the material is so soft, and they are extremely comfortable to wear. They make my legs look great.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sexy Lace

WARDROBE.NYC Lace Tights

Holiday date nights just got sexier...

Sizes: XXS-XL

Colors: Oxblood

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Soft Microfiber

Stems Avery Microfiber Tights

If you’ve ever brushed a hand against microfiber, you know it’s among the softest materials known to man.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Red, Navy, Pink, Violet, Brown

Material: Polyamide, elastane, cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Warm Wool

& Other Stories Ribbed Wool-Blend Tights

Most tights don’t provide much warmth, but these wool ones definitely do.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Burgundy

Material: Wool, polyester, spandex

Under $10

HeyUU Semi-Opaque Soft Footed Pantyhose

Half opaque, half sheer, and 100 percent budget-friendly.

Sizes: XS-3XL

Colors: 23 options

Material: Nylon, spandex

Customer review: “I love these tights so much more than I thought I would! They fit and stretch so nicely. They don’t rip easily and are soft and breathable.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Muted Option

Madewell Sheer Tights

I associate Madewell with all things cozy and autumnal; these wine-toned tights fall perfectly within that category.

Sizes: S/M, M/L

Colors: True Black, Juniper, Bright Cherry, Cabernet

Material: Polyamide, elastane
